verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the prophet: <S%H5030><s%>

<S%H5046>"Declare<s%> and <S%H8085>proclaim<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> <S%H8085>Proclaim<s%> it and <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H5251>standard.<s%> Do not <S%H3582>conceal<s%> [it but] <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H894>'Babylon<s%> has been <S%H3920>captured,<s%> <S%H1078>Bel<s%> has <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> <S%H4781>Marduk<s%> has <S%H2865>been<s%> <S%H2865>shattered;<s%> Her <S%H6091>images<s%> have <S%H954>been<s%> <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame,<s%> her <S%H1544>idols<s%> have <S%H2865>been<s%> <S%H2865>shattered.<s%>'

"For a <S%H1471>nation<s%> has <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> her out of the <S%H6828>north;<s%> it will <S%H7896>make<s%> her <S%H776>land<s%> an <S%H8047>object<s%> of <S%H8047>horror,<s%> and there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> in it. <S%H4480>Both<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%> have <S%H5110>wandered<s%> off, they have <S%H1980>gone<s%> away!

"In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> [both] they and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H9191>well;<s%> they will <S%H1980>go<s%> along <S%H1058>weeping<s%> as they <S%H1980>go,<s%> and it will be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> they will <S%H1245>seek.<s%>

"They will <S%H7592>ask<s%> for the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> [turning] their <S%H6440>faces<s%> in its <S%H2008>direction;<s%> they will <S%H935>come<s%> that they may <S%H3867>join<s%> themselves to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [in] an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that will not be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

"My <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H1961>become<s%> lost <S%H6>sheep;<s%> Their <S%H6629>shepherds<s%> have <S%H7462>led<s%> them <S%H8582>astray.<s%> They have made them <S%H8582>turn<s%> <S%H7725>aside<s%> [on] the <S%H7725>mountains;<s%> They have <S%H2022>gone<s%> along from <S%H1980>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>hill<s%> And have <S%H1389>forgotten<s%> their <S%H7911>resting<s%> <S%H7258>place.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> who <S%H4672>came<s%> upon them have <S%H398>devoured<s%> them; And their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> 'We are not <S%H816>guilty,<s%> <S%H8478>Inasmuch<s%> <S%H834><s%> as they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [who is] the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> Even the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of their fathers.'

<S%H5110>"Wander<s%> away from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> And <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> Be also like <S%H6260>male<s%> <S%H6260>goats<s%> at the <S%H6440>head<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H5782>arouse<s%> and <S%H5927>bring<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> A <S%H6951>horde<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> And they will <S%H6186>draw<s%> up [their] <S%H6186>battle<s%> <S%H6186>lines<s%> against her; From <S%H8033>there<s%> she will be <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H3920>captive.<s%> Their <S%H2671>arrows<s%> will be like an <S%H7919>expert<s%> <S%H1368>warrior<s%> Who does not <S%H7725>return<s%> empty-handed.

"And <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H7998>plunder;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H7997>plunder<s%> her will <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7646>enough,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Because<s%> you are <S%H8055>glad,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you are <S%H5937>jubilant,<s%> O you who <S%H8154>pillage<s%> My <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you <S%H6335>skip<s%> <S%H6335>about<s%> like a <S%H1758>threshing<s%> <S%H5697>heifer<s%> And <S%H6670>neigh<s%> like <S%H47>stallions,<s%>

Your <S%H517>mother<s%> will be <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> She who <S%H3205>gave<s%> you <S%H3205>birth<s%> will be <S%H2659>humiliated.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> [she will be] the <S%H319>least<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> A <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> a <S%H6723>parched<s%> <S%H6723>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>desert.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of the <S%H7110>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> she will not be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> But she will be <S%H3605>completely<s%> <S%H8077>desolate;<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by <S%H894>Babylon<s%> will be <S%H8074>horrified<s%> And will <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4347>wounds.<s%>

<S%H6186>"Draw<s%> up your <S%H6186>battle<s%> <S%H6186>lines<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> you who <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> <S%H3034>Shoot<s%> at her, do not be <S%H2550>sparing<s%> with [your] <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> For she has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H7321>"Raise<s%> your <S%H7321>battle<s%> <S%H7321>cry<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side!<s%> She has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3027>herself<s%> up, her <S%H9038>pillars<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> Her <S%H2346>walls<s%> have been <S%H2040>torn<s%> <S%H2040>down.<s%> For <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H5358>Take<s%> <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on her; As she has <S%H6213>done<s%> [to others, so] <S%H6213>do<s%> to her.

<S%H3772>"Cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2232>sower<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> And the one who <S%H8610>wields<s%> the <S%H4038>sickle<s%> at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest;<s%> From <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressor<s%> They will <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H6437>back<s%> to his own <S%H5971>people,<s%> And they will <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> to his own <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3478>"Israel<s%> is a <S%H6340>scattered<s%> <S%H7716>flock,<s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%> have <S%H5080>driven<s%> [them] <S%H5080>away.<s%> The <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7223>one<s%> [who] <S%H398>devoured<s%> him was the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H314>one<s%> [who] has <S%H9430>broken<s%> his <S%H9430>bones<s%> is <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and his <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as I <S%H6485>punished<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

'And I shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to his <S%H5116>pasture,<s%> and he will <S%H7462>graze<s%> on <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and his <S%H5315>desire<s%> will be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

'In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1245>'search<s%> will be <S%H1245>made<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>none;<s%> and for the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> but they will not be <S%H4672>found;<s%> for I shall <S%H5545>pardon<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H7604>leave<s%> as a <S%H7604>remnant.<s%>'

<S%H5921>"Against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4850>Merathaim,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> it, And <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6489>Pekod.<s%> <S%H9163>Slay<s%> and <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.
"The <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%> is in the <S%H776>land,<s%> And <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

<S%H349>"How<s%> the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> Has been <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>off<s%> and <S%H7665>broken!<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> An <S%H8047>object<s%> of <S%H8047>horror<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

"I <S%H3369>set<s%> a <S%H3369>snare<s%> for you, and you were <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3920>caught,<s%> O <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> While you <S%H9040>yourself<s%> were not <S%H3045>aware;<s%> You have been <S%H4672>found<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8610>seized<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H1624>engaged<s%> in <S%H1624>conflict<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6605>opened<s%> His <S%H214>armory<s%> And has <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of His <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> For it is a <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

<S%H935>Come<s%> to her from the <S%H7093>farthest<s%> <S%H7093>border;<s%> <S%H6605>Open<s%> up her <S%H3965>barns,<s%> <S%H5549>Pile<s%> her up <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H6194>heaps<s%> And <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> her, Let <S%H408>nothing<s%> be <S%H7611>left<s%> to her.

<S%H9163>Put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> to the <S%H9163>sword;<s%> Let them <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter!<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> be upon them, for their <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> The <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>punishment.<s%>

There is a <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H5127>fugitives<s%> and <S%H9453>refugees<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> To <S%H5046>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5360>Vengeance<s%> for His <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

<S%H8085>"Summon<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> those who <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow:<s%> <S%H2583>Encamp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side,<s%> Let there be <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H6413>escape.<s%> <S%H9608>Repay<s%> her according to her <S%H6467>work;<s%> According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that she has <S%H6213>done,<s%> [so] <S%H6213>do<s%> to her; For she has <S%H2102>become<s%> <S%H2102>arrogant<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H413>Against<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> her <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> will be <S%H1826>silenced<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H2087>arrogant<s%> one," <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "For your <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> The <S%H6256>time<s%> when I shall <S%H6485>punish<s%> you.

"And the <S%H2087>arrogant<s%> one will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> With <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H6965>raise<s%> him up; And I shall <S%H3341>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> to his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> And it will <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5439>environs.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H6231>oppressed,<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H9191>well;<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7617>took<s%> them <S%H7617>captive<s%> have <S%H2388>held<s%> them <S%H2388>fast,<s%> They have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

"Their <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>strong,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is His <S%H8034>name;<s%> He will <S%H7378>vigorously<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>case,<s%> <S%H4616>So<s%> that He may <S%H7280>bring<s%> <S%H7280>rest<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> But <S%H7264>turmoil<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

"A <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "And <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> And <S%H413>against<s%> her <S%H8269>officials<s%> and her <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men!<s%>

"A <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H907>oracle<s%> <S%H907>priests,<s%> and they will <S%H2973>become<s%> <S%H2973>fools!<s%> A <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> her <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men,<s%> and they will be <S%H2865>shattered!<s%>

"A <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> their <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> And <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9434>foreigners<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her, And they will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H802>women!<s%> A <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> her <S%H214>treasures,<s%> and they will be <S%H962>plundered!<s%>

"A <S%H2721>drought<s%> on her <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they will be <S%H3001>dried<s%> up! For it is a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6456>idols,<s%> And they are <S%H1984>mad<s%> over <S%H367>fearsome<s%> idols.

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> the <S%H9478>desert<s%> <S%H9478>creatures<s%> will <S%H3427>live<s%> [there] <S%H854>along<s%> with the <S%H338>jackals;<s%> The <S%H3284>ostriches<s%> also will <S%H3427>live<s%> in it, And it will <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> Or <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

"As when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> And <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> with its <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will [any] <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>reside<s%> in it.
